name: CategoryTheory.SimplicialThickening.Path.mk.injEq
initialProofState:
J : Type u_1
inst‚úù : LinearOrder J
i j : J
I‚úù : Set J
left‚úù : autoParam (Membership.mem I‚úù i) _auto‚úù
right‚úù : autoParam (Membership.mem I‚úù j) _auto‚úù
left_le‚úù : autoParam (‚àÄ (k : J), Membership.mem I‚úù k ‚Üí LE.le i k) _auto‚úù
le_right‚úù : autoParam (‚àÄ (k : J), Membership.mem I‚úù k ‚Üí LE.le k j) _auto‚úù
I : Set J
left : autoParam (Membership.mem I i) _auto‚úù
right : autoParam (Membership.mem I j) _auto‚úù
left_le : autoParam (‚àÄ (k : J), Membership.mem I k ‚Üí LE.le i k) _auto‚úù
le_right : autoParam (‚àÄ (k : J), Membership.mem I k ‚Üí LE.le k j) _auto‚úù
‚ä¢ Eq (Eq { I := I‚úù, left := left‚úù, right := right‚úù, left_le := left_le‚úù, le_right := le_right‚úù } { I := I, left := left, right := right, left_le := left_le, le_right := le_right }) (Eq I‚úù I)
decl:
/--
A path from `i` to `j` in a linear order `J` is a subset of the interval `[i, j]` in `J` containing
the endpoints.
-/
@[ext]
structure Path {J : Type*} [LinearOrder J] (i j : J) where
  /-- The underlying subset -/
  I : Set J
  left : i ‚àà I := by simp
  right : j ‚àà I := by simp
  left_le (k : J) (_ : k ‚àà I) : i ‚â§ k := by simp
  le_right (k : J) (_ : k ‚àà I) : k ‚â§ j := by simp

name: CategoryTheory.SimplicialThickening.instCategoryStruct_id_I
initialProofState:
J : Type u_1
inst‚úù : LinearOrder J
i : CategoryTheory.SimplicialThickening J
‚ä¢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.id i).I (Singleton.singleton i)
decl:
@[simps]
instance (J : Type*) [LinearOrder J] : CategoryStruct (SimplicialThickening J) where
  Hom i j := Path i j
  id i := { I := {i} }
  comp {i j k} f g := {
    I := f.I ‚à™ g.I
    left := Or.inl f.left
    right := Or.inr g.right
    left_le l := by
      rintro (h | h)
      exacts [(f.left_le l h), (Path.le f).trans (g.left_le l h)]
    le_right l := by
      rintro (h | h)
      exacts [(f.le_right _ h).trans (Path.le g), (g.le_right l h)] }

@[simp]
lemma id_comp (i j : SimplicialThickening J) :
    (Œª_ (Hom i j)).inv ‚â´ id i ‚ñ∑ Hom i j ‚â´ comp i i j = ùüô (Hom i j) := by

name: CategoryTheory.SimplicialThickening.functor_map
initialProofState:
J K : Type u
inst‚úù¬π : LinearOrder J
inst‚úù : LinearOrder K
f : OrderHom J K
i j : CategoryTheory.SimplicialThickening J
‚ä¢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.SimplicialThickening.functor f).map i j) (CategoryTheory.nerveMap (CategoryTheory.SimplicialThickening.functorMap f i j))
decl:
/--
The simplicial thickening defines a functor from the category of linear orders to the category of
simplicial categories
-/
@[simps]
noncomputable def functor {J K : Type u} [LinearOrder J] [LinearOrder K]
    (f : J ‚Üío K) : EnrichedFunctor SSet (SimplicialThickening J) (SimplicialThickening K) where
  obj := f
  map i j := nerveMap ((functorMap f i j))
  map_id i := by
    ext
    simp only [eId, EnrichedCategory.id]
    exact Functor.ext (by aesop_cat)
  map_comp i j k := by
    ext
    simp only [eComp, EnrichedCategory.comp]
    exact Functor.ext (by aesop_cat)

@[simps]
noncomputable def functor {J K : Type u} [LinearOrder J] [LinearOrder K]

name: CategoryTheory.SimplicialThickening.functor_id
initialProofState:
J : Type u
inst‚úù : LinearOrder J
‚ä¢ Eq (CategoryTheory.SimplicialThickening.functor OrderHom.id) (CategoryTheory.EnrichedFunctor.id SSet (CategoryTheory.SimplicialThickening J))
decl:
lemma functor_id (J : Type u) [LinearOrder J] :
    (functor (OrderHom.id (Œ± := J))) = EnrichedFunctor.id _ _ := by
  refine EnrichedFunctor.ext _ (fun _ ‚Ü¶ rfl) fun i j ‚Ü¶ ?_

name: CategoryTheory.SimplicialThickening.functor_comp
initialProofState:
J K L : Type u
inst‚úù¬≤ : LinearOrder J
inst‚úù¬π : LinearOrder K
inst‚úù : LinearOrder L
f : OrderHom J K
g : OrderHom K L
‚ä¢ Eq (CategoryTheory.SimplicialThickening.functor (g.comp f)) (CategoryTheory.EnrichedFunctor.comp SSet (CategoryTheory.SimplicialThickening.functor f) (CategoryTheory.SimplicialThickening.functor g))
decl:
lemma functor_comp {J K L : Type u} [LinearOrder J] [LinearOrder K]
    [LinearOrder L] (f : J ‚Üío K) (g : K ‚Üío L) :
    functor (g.comp f) =
      (functor f).comp _ (functor g) := by
  refine EnrichedFunctor.ext _ (fun _ ‚Ü¶ rfl) fun i j ‚Ü¶ ?_
  ext
  exact Functor.ext (by aesop_cat)
